title: Using the Inbox
intro: Enterprise Users have the addition of the Inbox in their Dashboard configuration. The Inbox allows the management of Tasks within the Enterprise. In this section we will go in depth into the Inbox and using it on the web and the mobile apps.

blocks.content: As the Inbox is part of the Dashboard, it is the first thing that logged in Users will see. Much like an email Inbox, the FieldLogs Inbox is the component that most Enterprise FieldLogs Users will use the most. To that end, the Inbox is fully enabled to allows Users to filter, sort and action on various types of Tasks.
